name: Marble Mountain and Lady Buddha by bicycle
description:
Travelling by bicycle is the best way to explore a new destination, you can touch to nature and culture in the near distance. It's also a chanllenge for you to pass a distance 30km. 
Together, we will explore 5 mountains of The Marble Mountain; ride bicycle on the most beautiful street of Danang city - seaside street; win the slopes of Monkey Mountain to come to Linh Ung pagoda, the biggest pagoda of Danang city with Lady Buddha. In addition, you can watch the daily life of Danang farmer who live in the Han riverside and the foot of Marble Mountain. 
We will have 2 meals in this tour, you can try Quang Noodle and Da Nang fresh seafood.
Let's try it and tell me the thing you see!
